attributes.action: remove the franchise from London Midland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the fiasco caused yesterday by staff not wanting to offer themselves to work, it is plain that the franchise awarded to London Midland was untenable. They are trying to run a seven day service on goodwill only, and their removal of the short term double time payment for working on a Sunday has made the situation plain ; they cannot run a full seven day service.

The signatories urge the government to remove this firm and instate one that is able to sgree to deliver a full service.
